overview: In this Veggie-version of a holiday classic, Junior Asparagus stars as The Little Drummer Boy, a lonely child who finds the true meaning of Christmas when he stumbles upon the birth of the baby Jesus. A story of hope, love and forgiveness, this timeless tale will warm the hearts of children everywhere!
tagline: When it seems you have nothing to bring... What gift can you give the King?
title: VeggieTales: The Little Drummer Boy
